column1: adaneth is Sindarin for a "mortal woman".
column3: this word refers only to those women who are descended from the Edain.

column1: In the Athrabeth Finrod ah Andreth King Finrod addresses Andreth as adaneth
column2: stressing the fact that she is a mortal
column3: because their debate centers on "the gulf that divides our kindreds".
